channel.title: Kenneth Gregson on A²R Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Kenneth Gregson on A²R Lab

item.title: Project-based, collaborative, algorithmic robotics for high school students: Programming self-driving race cars at MIT
item.description: We describe the pedagogy behind the MIT Beaver Works Summer Institute Robotics Program, a new high-school STEM program in robotics. The program utilizes state-of-the-art sensors and embedded computers for mobile robotics. The program was offered as a four-week residential program at MIT in the summer of 2016.
